languages.text: "Послушай, дитя, эта ноша слишком тяжела для одной тебя. Ты еще не готова..."

traits.locale_text: "Послушай, дитя, эта ноша слишком тяжела для одной тебя. Ты еще не готова..."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."
languages.original_text: "Послушай, дитя, эта ноша слишком тяжела для одной тебя. Ты еще не готова..."

traits.locale_text: "Hear me, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet prepared..."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Hear me, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet prepared..."

traits.locale_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “听我们一言吧，孩子。这个负担对你而言太沉重了，你不能独自承担。你还没有准备好……”
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: “听我们一言吧，孩子。这个负担对你而言太沉重了，你不能独自承担。你还没有准备好……”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Escúchame, niña, es una carga muy pesada para ti sola. Aún no estás lista...».
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: «Escúchame, niña, es una carga muy pesada para ti sola. Aún no estás lista...».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「聞くのだ、我が子よ。この重荷は、お前1人で背負うには重すぎる。お前はまだ準備が…」
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: 「聞くのだ、我が子よ。この重荷は、お前1人で背負うには重すぎる。お前はまだ準備が…」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hört zu, Kind. Diese Bürde ist zu groß, als dass Ihr sie alleine schultern könntet. Ihr seid noch nicht so weit ..."
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: "Hört zu, Kind. Diese Bürde ist zu groß, als dass Ihr sie alleine schultern könntet. Ihr seid noch nicht so weit ..."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Écoutez-nous, Enfant. Ce fardeau est bien trop lourd pour vous seule. Vous n'êtes pas encore prête... »
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-nous, mon enfant. Ce fardeau est bien trop lourd pour vous seule. Vous n'êtes pas encore prête... »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Dinle beni çocuğum. Bu yük senin kendi başına omuzlayamayacağın kadar ağır. Henüz hazır değilsin."
languages.original_text: "Hear us, child. This burden is too heavy for you to shoulder alone. You are not yet ready..."

traits.locale_text: "Dinle beni çocuğum. Bu yük senin kendi başına omuzlayamayacağın kadar ağır. Henüz hazır değilsin."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
